name: Parmesan Ranch Popcorn
description: Gear up for game day snacking! Just toss your popcorn with a generous amount of Parmesan cheese or Cheesy Fries Seasoning and a secret ingredient – Creamy Ranch Dip Mix! It’s a touchdown of flavour that’s cheesy & tangy that’ll have you and your pals doing the end zone dance. Game on!

ingredients.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix or Caesar Dressing Mix

preparation:
1. Place kernels in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 5–6 min or until popping has slowed down. Pour into a large bowl. Discard any un-popped kernels.  
  2. Spritz or toss popcorn with oil; sprinkle cheese and dip mix on top. Toss well to coat popcorn. Add more dip mix, to taste.
tips: Serve in small bowls (like Prep Bowls) or napkins for an easy and tasty appetizer!
